name: In the footsteps of the Tiger of Mysore.
description: Discover the history of Bangalore fort, its tales of glory & treachery over the past five centuries with us.The walk begins with a vegetarian breakfast. After that we take our guests to explore the remnants of Tipu's summer palace, the Bangalore fort & the armory.During the course of the walk learn how Anglo-French wars in Europe & North America had their impact in Southern India too.The guests get to learn more about Tipu's weapons on mass destruction of the 18th century & how they influenced the US national anthem & how one small Southern Indian kingdom was a thorn in the East India Company's rule.

location.address: XH5F+PFR, Tippu Sultan Palace Rd, Chamrajpet, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560018, India

organizer.name: Bengaluru by foot
organizer.description: Heritage, food & architectural walks in Bangalore.

name: AstroCamp 2.0 🌌 | Overnight Stay
description: 🌌 Experience the Universe Like Never Before! 🌠We are back with Astrocamp 2.0 for you to step into the Cosmos with us! 🔭Ready for a night where the universe feels just a touch away?Escape the city lights and immerse yourself in a night of celestial wonder at our Overnight Astro Camp, just a 2-hour drive from Bangalore. Experience breathtaking views of the night sky as you observe planets, galaxies, and constellations through powerful telescopes. Engage in guided stargazing sessions and cosmic storytelling, all set in a serene natural landscape. Whether you're an astronomy enthusiast or just looking for a magical night under the stars, this is an experience you won’t want to miss! ✨Your Experience Includes:•	A Private Cottage in the lap of Nature (2 person sharing, extra mattress available if required)•	Evening High Tea, Dinner, and Breakfast to fuel your cosmic adventure•	A Magical Journey across Galaxies — No passport required!📅 Date: Check in: 26th April (04:00 PM IST) Check Out: 27th April (11:00 AM IST)📍 Location: Atmaveda Shivasamudra (https://maps.app.goo.gl/mxvzyAF25Pe7mb9N9)⏳ Limited Spots Only! Book now and travel beyond our world! 🚀✨Cancellation PolicyOnce the payment is made, your spot is confirmed, and you have committed to attending the event. As participation is limited to only 30 individuals, cancellations can be challenging since all necessary arrangements, including accommodations, meals, and logistics, are planned in advance.We understand that unforeseen circumstances may arise, making it difficult for you to attend. While refunds are not available, your entry is transferable. If you are unable to join, you may transfer your booking to someone else by informing the organizers in advance.DisclaimerAstro Camp is a weather-dependent experience, and clear skies are essential for optimal stargazing and astronomical observations. While we will do our best to provide an enriching experience, certain celestial events, planetary viewings, and deep-sky observations may be affected by cloud cover, rain, or other unforeseen weather conditions.In case of unfavorable weather, alternative activities such as interactive astronomy discussions, short documentaries, astrophotography techniques, and telescope handling sessions will be conducted to ensure a fulfilling experience. However, no refunds will be issued due to weather-related disruptions.We appreciate your understanding and look forward to an incredible stargazing experience with you!

location.address: Bengaluru, Karnataka, India

name: If backpacks could talk: where travel meets story
description: Something magical happens when you put travelers in a room. Join a gathering of people who’ve travelled, wondered, and returned with something to share. ✈️🧳🚂🚌This is a space for travel stories. You’re encouraged to bring a cherished souvenir from one of your travels. Expect the atmosphere of that hostel living room you’ve never forgotten. ✨Bring a story if you’d like or simply come curious. You might leave with a new perspective, a shared laugh, or even an itinerary inspired by someone else’s journey. :)About the facilitatorNitya is a slow, solo traveler who’s spent months at a time backpacking through Europe, Southeast and Central Asia with no fixed plans. She’s lived out of hostels, taken long detours, and found meaning in volunteering along the way. Her journeys are guided more by conversations than checklists. To her, travel is about finding the shared essence in the unfamiliar and returning with a deeper connection to the familiar.About the venueDialogues Cafe, Koramangala is known for creating spaces that enable meaningful conversations and a seamless experience. With several events hosted regularly, you’ll have no trouble being guided to the beautiful glass house on the rooftop, where our gathering will take place. See you there! 🙂

location.address: 21, 80 Feet Rd, Nirguna Mandir Layout, 4th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095, India

name: The Bohra Thaal – An Authentic Bohra Cuisine
description: Have You Ever Experienced Dining in a Traditional Bohra Thaal?If not, here’s your chance to be part of an intimate and one-of-a-kind home dining experience. Hosted in the comfort of a warm, welcoming home, this gathering brings together like-minded individuals to share a meal, exchange stories, and turn strangers into friends—all while indulging in the rich flavors of Bohra cuisine.Bohra cuisine originates from the Bohra Muslim community, with roots tracing back to Yemen before flourishing in India. Over the centuries, it has evolved into a delightful fusion of Middle Eastern, Mughlai, Gujarati, and Maharashtrian flavors, reflecting a legacy of migration, trade, and cultural influences.What makes Bohra dining truly special is its communal style—meals are served in a giant "Thaal", where 4 to 6 guests dine together, fostering a deep sense of connection, warmth, and tradition.From Finance to Flavours: My Journey into Bohra CuisineAs a Chartered Accountant, I built a career in finance, working with esteemed firms like Avendus and ASK. While finance was my profession, my true passion lay in cooking.Back in Mumbai, my home-cooked meals were always a highlight among friends and colleagues. After relocating to Bengaluru six months ago, I finally decided to follow my culinary dream, giving birth to The Bohra Thaal—a heartfelt endeavor to bring the authentic Bohra "Thaal" experience to Namma Bengaluru.Now, we invite you to be part of this journey and savor a 9-course Bohra feast—served with love, straight from our home to your plate.What to Expect?🍽️ Indulge in an authentic 9-course Bohra feast🍛 Dine the traditional way—sharing a giant Thaal with 4 to 6 guests🏡 Experience the warmth of home-style communal dining⏳ Pre-booking closes 2 days in advance"The nourishment of the body is food, while the nourishment of the soul is feeding others." — Hazrat Ali

location.address: BLOCK-10, PRESTIGE NOTTING HILL, Bannerghatta Rd, Kalena Agrahara, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560076, India

organizer.name: TheBohraThaal
organizer.description: The Bohra Thaal offers a unique home dining experience, bringing the rich traditions of Bohra cuisine to your table. Dine the authentic way—sharing a giant Thaal, savoring a curated 9-course feast, and connecting over food in a warm, welcoming home. Come as strangers, leave as friends!

name: Human Library Bengaluru
description: Each chapter of the Human Library is a guided space for meaningful non-judgmental conversations structured by thoughtful prompts. These prompts allow attendees to explore different perspectives stories and memories.Note: This is not a dating event.You can choose to listen to others` stories and share your own when you feel comfortable. Every participant takes turns sharing a memory opinion or experience related to the prompt assigned to them.Structure of the event:1. Introduction of attendees and the host.2. Attendees are divided into smaller groups.4. Each group receives a bowl of prompts.5. Prompts are divided into three levels: Level 1 Level 2 and Level 3.6. Level 1 prompts help people get to know each other.Example: What is your earliest childhood memory?7. Level 2 prompts encourage deeper conversations.Example: What is one habit from your lifestyle that you would recommend to others?8. Once Level 1 and Level 2 conversations are completed the smaller groups are merged for Level 3 prompts.9. Depending on the number of attendees either one or two larger groups are formed for Level 3 conversations.Come. Join. Share your stories or listen to othersCheck out our past events on our : @HumanlibrarybengaluruFor more details reach out to: +91 8867945246

location.address: 25, Lavelle Road, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India

name: Aperitivo Italiano - Cicchetti e Vino in Bengaluru
description: Bengaluru, Sip & Savour Italy – One Glass at a TimeStep into a slice of Italy in the heart of Bengaluru! Aperitivo Italiano, part of IICCI’s Project Il Dolce Vino, invites you to an evening of exquisite wines, gourmet Italian delicacies, and expert-led tastings at the iconic Italia – The Park.Meet fellow wine lovers, connect with Indo-Italian business and lifestyle enthusiasts, and enjoy a vibrant cultural experience over glasses of fine Italian wine.🔹 Join us for an evening of La Dolce Vita – Bengaluru style!Note: Only one booking per person is allowed.

location.address: The Park, 14/7 14 7, Mahatma Gandhi Rd, Yellappa Garden, Yellappa Chetty Layout, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560042, India

organizer.name: Il Dolce Vino
organizer.description: Il Dolce Vino, by IICCI, promotes authentic Italian food and wine in India. It supports Italian exports via exclusive Wine Clubs in key cities, offering events, awareness programs, curated wine tours, and expert-led training, uniting the Indo-Italian food and wine community.

name: Wine Dinner: Battle of the Somms!
description: Sommeliers Devati and Gargi are bringing back the wine battle — but this time, they're taking it poolside with a luxe dinner twist! After a wildly fun debut in Goa last year, Battle of the Somm returns for Edition 2 in Bangalore, and it's a full-blown Wine & Dine showdown under the stars!Here’s the plan:We’ll pour you 7 spectacular Australian wines — starting with a fun welcome pour and then 3 head-to-head wine flights where each of us showcases one wine per flight. You taste. You vote. By the end of the night, YOU decide which somm’s wine selection reigns supreme!Expect iconic wines only from St Hugo, Two Hands, Yalumba and more — showcasing Australia’s bold, expressive wines at their absolute finest. To match? An elevated 5-course modern Indian menu — luxe flavours, playful plating, and inventive pairings, all served by the pool at the beautiful Spice Terrace, JW Marriott Bangalore.It’s a wine dinner like no other — a night of discovery, fun banter, bold opinions and brilliant pairings — where you’re a part of the epic battle!Only 20 seats for this intimate, high-energy evening. Come for the wine, stay for the drama. Let the wine games begin!______________________________MenuSlice of India – Indian Cheese BarKalari, Chhurpi, Bandel, Kalimpong, Perad, Indian Gouda, Quadam, Topli na Paneer, Darjeeling SnowServed with Indian crackers, Gurbandi Mamra Badam Giri, Vengurla cashews, Pishori pista, dried aloo bukhara, Kashmiri akhrotPaired with: Berton Vineyards, Metal Label Vermentino, RiverinaPass-around appetizers Ghutwa kebab | phool makhana, nadru, guchchi achaar (v)Daulat Ke Kebab | winter melon, beetroot carpaccio, mini blue cheese naan (v)Gulabi Gosht Lukmi | lamb mince, purple potato, fermented chilli caviar, mint aioli Petha Phool Pakoda | zucchini blossom tempura, kari patta lobster Paired with: Yalumba Y Series, Viognier, South Australia & Yalumba Y Series, Chardonnay, South AustraliaEntréeTandoori Sweet Potato Mille-Feuille | burnt garlic & tamarind reduction, curry leaf crisps, micro sorrel (v)ORTandoori Octopus | sous-vide, charred, spiced with ajwain, coconut milk base, chilli oil drizzleORNargisi Lamb Kofta | spiced mango–turmeric raita, micro herbsPaired with: St Hugo Coonawarra Cabernet Sauvignon & Vasse Felix Cabernet Sauvignon, Margaret RiverPalate CleanserOrange Blossom Churan ChuskiMain CourseSunehri Dulma | portobello mushroom, chenna, bounty vegetables, 24k gold leaf, shallot truffle gravy, sunflower seed & cranberry baqarkhani (v)ORSunehri Kaliyan | pulled Hyderabadi lamb shank, 24k gold leaf, shallot truffle gravy, sunflower seed & cranberry baqarkhaniPaired with: St Hugo Barossa Shiraz & Two Hands Angels' Share Shiraz, McLaren ValeDessertRose Cookie Ghevar | ruby chocolate whipped ganache, rose, pine nut kulfiQehwah | Mukhwas******

location.address: 24/1, Vittal Mallya Rd, KG Halli, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India

organizer.name: Drink With D
organizer.description: DWD is a Sommelier-led wine consulting and wine experience brand. Join us in exploring the fascinating world of wine through fun tastings and curated experiences!

name: No One Told Me How to Be a Man
description: No One Told Me How to Be a Man is a first-of-its-kind offline gathering designed for men who are done pretending they’ve got it all figured out.. It’s not therapy. It’s not a workshop. And no one’s going to ask you to “open up” if you don’t want to.It’s just a room full of guys who get it—who’ve also felt lost, burnt out, unsure of who they are outside of work or relationships, or just plain tired of pretending to have it all together.We’ll talk about the stuff that doesn’t usually come up—pressure, failure, identity, and what it actually means to be a man right now. You can speak, or just listen. You’ll leave feeling a little less alone, and maybe even a little lighter.No fixing. No judgement. Just real talk, in a space we’ve all needed—but never had.👥 What to Expect🧩 The Unsaid Wall – An anonymous reflection activity to break the ice and realize: you're not alone.🎙️ Story Seeds – A space where we share true, lived moments—not motivational talks. Just honest, grounded experiences.💬 The Real Talk Round – A free-flowing conversation where you can speak if you want, or just sit and take it in.🧠 Leave With Less Weight – This isn’t a space to be “fixed.” It’s a space to be human. You’ll walk out feeling seen, maybe even lighter.☕ No awkward endings – We wrap with  music, and hangout time—because sometimes the best conversations happen after the "main part" is over.💥 What’s Special?This isn’t another self-help circle. It’s a brave space for men to show up as they are—mess and all.You won’t be lectured. There’s no “guru” here. Just stories, silence, laughter, and raw honesty.It’s rare. Most of us have never been in a room where it’s okay to not have it together. That changes now.

location.address: 21/1, Church Rd, Kanakapura, Basavanagudi, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560004, India

name: Brigade road heritage walk.
description: Join us as we revive our cherished walks through the historic Cantonment this year. Step back in time as we trace the origins of this storied district once the heart of colonial Bangalore.On this journey we will explore a magnificent church that has stood the test of time pay homage at a solemn war memorial and admire a beautifully restored heritage structure. Along the way we will encounter stately British-era government buildings a statue of a notable foreigner and a road steeped in its own fascinating history.Every corner of the Cantonment whispers tales of its past—stories of soldiers administrators and the many communities that shaped this unique enclave. Join us as we rediscover its enduring legacy one step at a time.

location.address: 15K, Brigade Rd, Shanthala Nagar, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560025, India

organizer.name: Bengaluru by foot
organizer.description: Heritage, food & architectural walks in Bangalore.

name: Explore a New Cuisine with Strangers
description: Try Something New, With Someone New 🍲✨Ever shared a meal with a stranger and left feeling like friends? That’s the vibe. This table is all about exploring a new cuisine, sharing stories, and letting good food do the heavy lifting.Come for the flavors, stay for the conversations. No pressure, no pretense — just a bunch of people bonding over something delicious.Let’s make Wednesdays taste a little more exciting. 🍽️💬

location.address: Indiranagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka, India

organizer.name: HighTable
organizer.description: HighTable is a unique social experience where you get to dine with 4-10 people and engage in meaningful conversations. Our tables create the perfect setting to expand your social circle, and build real connections. If you love good conversations with like-minded people, HighTable is for you!

name: Coffee & Conversations: A Latte to Talk About
description: Grab a mug, pull up a chair, and let’s spill the beans—literally and figuratively!This readers’ table is where caffeine meets chatter. Swap book recommendations, debate plot twists, or just share hilarious stories (we won’t judge if your latest “read” was a meme).The coffee’s hot, the vibes are warm, and there’s always a fresh take brewing. Whether you’re into novels, novellas, or random shower thoughts, come caffeinate your curiosity—because life’s too short for lukewarm convos!Pro tip: Sugar optional, puns mandatory. 😄📚☕✨

location.address: Jayanagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka, India

organizer.name: HighTable
organizer.description: HighTable is a unique social experience where you get to dine with 4-10 people and engage in meaningful conversations. Our tables create the perfect setting to expand your social circle, and build real connections. If you love good conversations with like-minded people, HighTable is for you!

name: Beers, Bros & Banter
description: Let’s face it—men don't always get the space to vent or just be. Between work, relationships, and being “the strong one,” it’s easy to feel like you’re carrying the weight of the world solo. This table is here to change that.Beers, Bros & Banter is for the guys who need a break from the hustle. It’s where you can crack open a cold one, share some laughs, and talk about life—no judgment, just a bunch of dudes looking for a good time and real conversation.So, if you’re ready to drop the “tough guy” act and swap stories with some new mates, this is your spot. Come for the beer, stay for the banter, and leave with some new bros and good vibes. 🍺

name: Sunday Breakfast with Strangers
description: Make Your Sunday Shine with New Connections!✨Join us for Sunday Breakfast with Strangers – a perfect chance to meet new people, share stories, and enjoy a relaxed morning together. It's the perfect way to start your day with new connections and great conversations! 🌟

Our tables create the perfect setting to expand your social circle, and build real connections. If you love good conversations with like-minded people, HighTable is for you!

name: Art Uncorked
description: Just good vibes, great conversations & a glass of wine.🍷Ever felt like the art world is too complicated or not meant for you? You're not alone. This table is a gentle introduction to the world of art—what it means, how to appreciate it, and even how it can be part of your life.We’ll chat about everything from what makes a piece special to how you can start exploring art without feeling overwhelmed. No fancy terms, no pressure—just an open space to learn, share, and enjoy.Whether you're a total beginner or just curious, come hang out with like-minded folks, ask questions, and maybe even find a piece of art you love!

location.address: Cunningham Rd, Vasanth Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka, India

organizer.name: HighTable

name: Yoga for Reproductive Health
description: This special yoga session facilitated by Soundarya is designed exclusively for women to support reproductive health through a nurturing blend of Hatha and Yin Yoga. These practices work in harmony to regulate the nervous system, an essential component in maintaining hormonal balance.Hatha Yoga builds strength and energy, while Yin Yoga encourages deep relaxation and emotional release. Together, they rejuvenate the body and mind, promoting long-term well-being for women at every stage of life. This session is especially beneficial for those dealing with chronic menstrual challenges, but it is open to anyone looking to enhance their quality of life through mindful movement and connection.We’ll close the session with a deeply calming guided meditation, followed by nourishing, hormone-supportive food curated by C+C.Come join a circle of like-minded women, take time for yourself, and walk away feeling grounded, supported, and cared for.  Each participant also receives a thoughtfully curated goodie bag!About the FacilitatorSoundarya is a Bangalore-based yoga instructor and dancer, deeply passionate about women's wellness. Her journey into holistic health was inspired by her own experiences with hormonal imbalances, which led her to explore the healing power of yoga, meditation, and mindful movement.Today, she guides women through tailored yoga sessions designed to support hormonal health, reduce stress, and reconnect with the body. Through her compassionate approach and personal understanding, Soundarya creates a safe space for women to heal, grow, and thrive.

location.name: Copper + Cloves

name: Peppa Play and Parent Pause
description: We're back with one of your favourites - a cozy art café for parents and a fun filled Peppe Pig playdate for the kids!While your little ones jump in muddy puddles (well, not real ones) and explore a world of Peppa inspired play, you get to unwindwith some art, coffee and conversation.For the parents: A surprise art experience just for you—designed to let you relax, create, and enjoy the process without any expectations. Think of this as a mini retreat for your mind, where you can explore materials, textures and artistic expression in ways you might not think. Trust us- it's going to be a refreshing, hands-on and immersive experience!

name: Ice Bath Weekend
description: Ice Bath Weekend: Chill, Share & Recharge ❄️💙More than just an ice bath—this is a space to challenge yourself, connect, and unwind. Whether you’re here for the thrill of the cold, a moment to reset, or to share in good company, this session is all about balance—fun, reflection, and feeling alive!🔹 What to Expect?✅ A refreshing ice bath to wake up your senses✅ A light-hearted sharing circle—real talk, no pressure✅ A supportive, like-minded communityCome for the chill, stay for the good vibes. Let’s dip, laugh, and connect! ❄️🔥

name: Travel With Kids @ Coro
description: Join us for a cozy fireside chat with Travel With Kids - the go-to guide for jet-setting families! Whether you're dreaming of your first trip with your toddler or figuring out how to manage airports with a stroller, this is the space to ask it all.👩‍👧‍👦 And guess what? While you sip, chat, and plan your next adventure, your little ones can explore the magic of Coro’s Playscape downstairs - supervised and full of joy!📍 Coro, 2nd Floor🗓️ Mother’s Day: Saturday, May 10🕰️ 11AM - 1PM💬 Seats are limited, so grab your mom friends and RSVP now!Let’s celebrate the moms who make everything possible, even travel with toddlers. 💼✈️🧡

name: Million Dollar Secret
description: ✨ Meet. Mingle. Misdirect. ✨INSPIRED by the Netflix Reality TV Show "💸Million Dollar Secret💸"Join us for a time of laughter, secrets, and surprises!One of you is playing a secret game. Can you figure out who?💰 One of you is secretly chosen to win the prize — if they can keep their identity hidden.The rest must use clues, deception, and deduction to expose the secret holder.If the group correctly guesses the secret person by the end, they steal the money.If they guess wrong, the secret holder takes it all.🍸 Drinks • 🍟 Snacks • 🕺 New Faces • 🎲 A Game of Deception📅 Date: 27 April 2025 (SUNDAY)⏰ Time: 6:00 pm onwards (estimate duartion 3 hrs)📍 Venue: Sunchees OakTrust no one... or trust everyone?

organizer.name: Behind The Mask
organizer.description: We throw unique events, where mystery meets mischief, and every event is an enchanted escape from the ordinary.

name: Cake Picnic
description: Join us for India’s first-ever Cake Picnic at Café Azzure, MG Road, on 27th April from 4 PM to 6 PM, hosted by @zarascakelicious. Picture this: picnic vibes, cozy seating, and a whole lot of cake chaos! Bring along a homemade or bakery-bought cake to enjoy free entry and receive a special cake box to collect slices. You can dig into your own cake and also try up to two slices from other bakers’ creations—it’s like a dessert potluck with sweet surprises! Guests are required to bring their own cake knives, while general cutlery will be provided by the café. Only vegetarian-friendly cakes are allowed (no animal gelatin), and eggless cakes are encouraged. Kindly pre-inform if your cake needs refrigeration. Every participant can also bring one guest for free. Limited spots available—DM to register your cake! By attending, you agree to the event’s terms and may appear in promotional photos or videos. Let’s cake, chill, and make memories!

location.address: 52, Mahatma Gandhi Rd, Haridevpur, Shanthala Nagar, Shivaji Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560001, India

name: Dreams by Akira Kurosawa - TPCC Bangalore
description: "Beyond himself, he is beautiful because the beauty is in the attitude of the director. This is evident not only in the didactic approach, but also in the whole slowness, in the quantity of respect and in the enormous, insolent security of the work. That a director in 1990 could be so strong, so serious, so moral and so hopeful, is already beautiful." - Donald RichieAn episodic adventure from Akira Kurosawa following eight dream-y vignettes of a "surrogate Kurosawa", spanning across various themes internalized by the director. A cognitive rendition of Kurosawa's own dreams and memories, the anthology film bleeds from one dream segment to another creating a universe of its own.

description: Are you keen on becoming a published features writer? Do you want to learn how to build on your curiosity and ideas?Join our online workshop, Write like a Pro, where we teach you the fundamentals of taking your ideas from inception to publication. The workshop is facilitated by Saritha and Suchi, published writers with over 20 years of experience each.📅 Sat May 3, 2025 -- 10 am to 5 pm

location.address: Bengaluru, Karnataka, India

name: Silent Hour @ the STUDIO
description: Take a pause from the rush of life and enter a space of quiet presence with our Silent Hours, happening every alternate Tuesday. This is your invitation to retreat from the noise, slow down, and reconnect with yourself in a gentle, mindful way.In our cozy, peaceful studio, you’re welcome to embrace stillness in a way that feels right for you, whether it’s meditating, reading, journaling, breathing deeply, stretching on your mat, crocheting, or simply sitting in quiet reflection. Let this be a moment to unplug from screens and distractions, creating a shared atmosphere of calm where every breath and movement holds intention.If you wish to, you can extend this practice into a silent, mindful dinner in our dining space. Eating in silence offers a beautiful way to slow down, savour each bite with full awareness, and deepen your connection to the present moment. Whether you dine solo or share this experience with a loved one, it’s a grounding and peaceful close to your evening.The Silent Hour then gently transitions into a sharing circle, where we come together to reflect, express, and connect before we part ways.Come as you are, and allow yourself this simple yet profound gift of presence. 💛Kindly note, its mandatory for participants need to handover the phone and any other multi-media gadgets to one of us. This is to support and nurture one's own mindfulness.
